quote_first: And then Wedderburn looked at his watch. “
quote_last: . I am going up by the quarter to twelve train, so that there is plenty of time. I think I shall wear my alpaca jacket - it is quite warm enough - and my grey felt hat and brown shoes. I suppose‚Äù
